Message.Title: My observations on Malls this weekend at Boca and Worth Ave and Aventura
Message.Msg: WoW!!!!! don't have any shares of AAPL but AAPL stores crazy packed. Lines out the doors Mini sold out, IPAD sold like bread - out of control never seen a express check out tables stocked with AAPL iPods, iPads at the stores selling like crazy

Message.Title: IBM down again? Why?
Message.Msg: It figures that a day after I take a small position with 15000 shares it drops more. Time to really start buying again. Double down today just a minute ago. If it drops after the first of the year I will have to go in heavy and really start buying. Good luck to all longs on this drop.
